description: With the 2018 NBA Draft scheduled for June 21 at Barclays Center in Brooklyn, the Portland Trail Blazers are hosting IMG Academy guard Anfernee Simons, Duke guard Trevon Duval, SMU guard Shake Melton, Kentucky guard Hamidou Diallo, UCMB guard Jairus Lyles and Idaho guard Victor Sanders in their third pre-draft workout on Monday, June 4. The Trail Blazers currently own one first round pick (24th) and no second round picks in the upcoming draft.
title: June 4 Pre-Draft Workout Participants

description: Monday, June 4 Jacob Evans (Cincinnati) – Guard – 6-6, 210  Devonte’ Graham (Kansas) – Guard – 6-2, 185  Nick King (Middle Tennessee State) – Forward – 6-7, 225  Jeff Roberson (Vanderbilt) – Forward – 6-6, 220  Landry Shamet (Wichita State) – Guard – 6-4, 188  Zach Thomas (Bucknell) – Forward – 6-7, 228 Monday, May 29 Kyran Bowman (Boston College) - Guard - 6-1, 188 Carsen Edwards (Purdue) - Guard - 6-1, 200 Kerem Kanter (Xavier) - Forward - 6-10, 240
title: 2018 Pre-Draft Workouts: Day 7
